title: BIM attribute statistics
description: Concatenated attribute statistics . Notes: if needed the type (string or number) of the attribute may be infer from the `mostFrequentValues` and/or `min`/`max` fields

alias.description: Alias of the Attribute name. Can be empty if alias and name are identical

modelName.description: Useful fro BIM filters to map attribute semantic to attribute name (i.e. GDB fields). _TODO: get the full list_
